basic.description:
Advanced supervised study in a specific area of musicology/ethnomusicology, music theory/analysis or music education. Regulations pertaining to the courses are available in the School of Music Office.
LEARNING HOURS    123 (6I;117P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Directed Special Study II

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    Level 4 and a GPA of 3.50 in MUSC at the 300-level and permission of the instructor and of the Chair of Undergraduate Studies.
